channel.title: Someone please help with hamachi!
channel.description:
I try to start and it keeps saying: [code] Failed to configure hamachi network adapter.
Configuration Problem is most likely caused by your firewalling software blocking DHCP traffic on hamachi adapter. Please make sure that UDP traffic from local port 68 to port 67 at 5.0.0.1 is allowed. Alternatively you can try completely disabling the firewall on hamachi adapter.
If neither of the above help or you dont understand this message, visit our support forums, report the problem and you will get help.
Would you like Hamachi to keep trying to configure the adapter while you adjust your firewall settings?
YES NO [/code] :eek: :confused: :eek: :confused: I've been using hamachi since this spring and it has worked fine! Can some one help with this mysterious error??

i have the newest hamachi and it all of the sudden crashed!

Yeah there has to be it even says in there check ur internet options and all firewalls and virus protectors, maybe you dont have updated hamachi or somthing i dont know.

item.title: Someone please help with hamachi!
item.dc:creator: @xdeathxmagex xdeathxmagex
item.description:
@xdeathxmagex wrote:

there is no windows firewall thing in my cp
and i have used hamachi since spring of this year!!
this happened this morning[br][size=1]Posted at: December 06, 2006, 02:57:09 PM[/size][hr]please help

Read full topic

item.title: Someone please help with hamachi!
item.dc:creator: @killer5kumi killer5kumi
item.description:
@killer5kumi wrote:

dude, u gotta go into your control panel, click the windows firewall thing, than go into one of the tabs, find one that has a add port in it. add port 43594, it will add the port to allow people threw the firewall to play your server no this wont make you get hacked, virused, etc. it just lets the port 43594, (wich most comps have) threw the server.

Read full topic
